column1: Do you know that you can go stealth and if you attack them from behind you will do more damage to them?
Berserker attacks are stronger but they take away your life and you can die.
Do you know that you can buy upgrades with Refined Mara?
Remember that the warehouse is a safe area where you can save the game.
There are special attacks where you have to press a key repeatedly to turn them on.
To have new attacks you will have to level up first.
There are chests that are not what they seem
Did you think I was going to tell you something? if you jump into space
With the E key you can see your current team
